thread.title: Great location and very nice hotel!
thread.title_full: Great location and very nice hotel! - Review of Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Satu S
title: Great location and very nice hotel!
text:
We stayed first in the big hotel near by Tiananmen square, kind of great location that as well but liked the location of this hotel, in Hutongs, alot more! It was a bit hard to find but definitely worth it! Very cute and clean hotel, good breakfast. The girl in reception was great, she spoke good english, was very friendly and helpfull. We booked the tour to the Great Wall with the hotel and everything went well.
The lounge area is very cosy, nice just to hang around if you have lazy days in Beijing.
